token_info.name: Synchrotron
token_info.description: @sarronco - Discover the music from the imaginary band Speedtouch as an interactive visual experience. Jam freely as a cosmic ray muon capable of experiencing relativistic time dilation. Visuals made for an interactive musical performance.  Made with Cables.gl Using textures from: Brian Tagalog @briantagalog  Download the Synchrotron mini game from the App Store or Itch.io.
